title: Dragon Mountain
author: Enhanced Eamon Team
intro:
The village of Thornbrook has lived in fear for months. A dragon has made its lair in the mountain caves above, and demands tribute in gold and livestock. The villagers have pooled their remaining wealth to hire a hero.

You are that hero.

This adventure showcases: Character Progression, Equipment System, Trading NPCs, and Combat.

rooms.name: Village Square
rooms.description: The humble village of Thornbrook. Frightened villagers peer at you from their windows. A shop is to the east, and the mountain path begins to the north.

rooms.name: Mountain Path
rooms.description: A steep, winding path up the mountainside. Scattered bones line the trail - grim reminders of the dragon's appetite.

rooms.name: General Store
rooms.description: A small shop with various supplies. The merchant looks nervous but eager for your business.

rooms.name: Cave Entrance
rooms.description: The mouth of a dark cave yawns before you. The smell of sulfur and smoke drifts out. Scorched earth surrounds the entrance.

rooms.name: Outer Cavern
rooms.description: A large cavern with multiple tunnels. The dragon's roars echo from deeper within. Piles of bones are scattered about.

rooms.name: Goblin Warren
rooms.description: A smaller cave filled with crude furnishings and the stench of goblins. These creatures serve the dragon.

rooms.name: Underground Stream
rooms.description: A crystal-clear stream flows through this cavern. Strange glowing mushrooms provide dim illumination.

rooms.name: Dragon's Hoard
rooms.description: The massive chamber where the dragon sleeps atop its mountain of treasure. Gold coins, jewels, weapons, and armor are piled everywhere. The dragon's eyes gleam in the darkness.

items.name: rusty sword
items.description: A basic iron sword, showing signs of age and wear.

items.name: leather armor
items.description: Basic leather armor that provides minimal protection.

items.name: healing potion
items.description: A red potion that restores health when consumed.

items.name: torch
items.description: A wooden torch wrapped in oil-soaked cloth. Provides light in dark places.

items.name: dragonscale shield
items.description: A shield made from dragon scales. Incredibly tough and resistant to fire.

items.name: flaming sword
items.description: A magnificent sword wreathed in magical flames. The blade never dulls.

items.name: goblin dagger
items.description: A crude but sharp dagger used by goblins.

items.name: gold coins
items.description: A pile of 500 gold coins from the dragon's hoard!

items.name: ruby necklace
items.description: An exquisite necklace with a massive ruby centerpiece.

items.name: chain mail
items.description: Heavy chain mail armor. Provides excellent protection.

items.name: steel sword
items.description: A well-crafted steel blade. Sharp and balanced.

items.name: magic scroll
items.description: A scroll inscribed with the spell 'Fireball'. Single use.

monsters.name: Marcus the Merchant
monsters.description: A portly merchant with a nervous smile. He's trying to make a profit even in these dark times.

monsters.name: goblin warrior
monsters.description: A snarling goblin with yellowed teeth and a crude weapon.

monsters.name: goblin scout
monsters.description: A smaller, quicker goblin keeping watch.

monsters.name: Scorch the Dragon
monsters.description: A massive red dragon with scales like rubies and eyes like burning coals. Smoke curls from its nostrils. This is a truly fearsome opponent!

dialogues.greeting: Welcome, brave hero! Looking for supplies before you face the dragon? I have everything you need... for the right price!

topics.response: Of course! I have weapons, armor, potions - everything an adventurer needs. Just say what you want to buy or sell.
That beast has ruined my business! No caravans dare come here anymore. If you slay it, I'll give you a discount on everything!
The dragon is incredibly powerful. You'll need good equipment and maybe some magic. Fire resistance would help - those scales of his are tough!
Thornbrook was once a prosperous place. Now we live in fear. Please, save us from this terror!

dialogues.farewell: Good luck! Come back alive and I'll buy any treasure you find!

dialogues.greeting: FOOLISH MORTAL! You dare enter MY domain? I have devoured HUNDREDS of your kind!

topics.response: Then you shall DIE like the others! Your bones will join the pile!
MY TREASURE! Every piece is MINE! Stolen by my claws from kingdoms far and wide! You shall not have a single coin!
Those pathetic creatures? Their tribute is barely worth my time. But it amuses me to watch them grovel.
Run while you can, little mortal. But know that I will find you if you speak of my hoard to others!

dialogues.farewell: Your bones will decorate my lair!

quests.title: Slay the Dragon
quests.description: The village of Thornbrook needs you to defeat Scorch the Dragon and end his reign of terror.
